General.Name: Bridger Aerospace Group Holdings Inc. Warrant
General.Description: Bridger Aerospace Group Holdings, Inc. provides aerial wildfire management, relief and suppression, and firefighting services in the United States. It offers fire suppression services, such as direct fire suppression aerial firefighting support services for ground crew to drop large amounts of water quickly and directly on wildfires. The company also provides aerial surveillance services, including fire suppression aircraft over an incident and tactical coordination with the incident commander through its manned and unmanned aircraft. It operates a fleet of 20 planes. The company is headquartered in Belgrade, Montana.
